query.statement: SELECT MM005A.LGORT CODE, --REPLACE(TRIM(MM012A.NAME1),'¡¡','') || '(' || SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(WB010A.MANDT,'ko','CS115',WB010A.BSU_ARA) || ')' CODE_NAME, REPLACE(TRIM(MM012A.NAME1),'¡¡','') || '(' || SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(WB010A.MANDT,'ko','CS115',WB010A.BSU_ARA) || ')' || MM005A.LGORT CODE_NAME, VALUE(WB010A.BSU_GB,'') AS BSU_GB, DECODE(VALUE(WB010A.BSU_GB,''),'1','Á÷¿µ','Çù·Â') AS BSU_GB_NM, WB010A.USED, WB010A.VKGRP, LCODE.DTEXT1 AS VKBUR FROM SAPHEE.ZWBT010 WB010A, SAPHEE.ZMMT012 MM012A, SAPHEE.ZMMT005 MM005A, SAPHEE.ZLCODE LCODE WHERE WB010A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND WB010A.MANDT = MM012A.MANDT AND WB010A.MANDT = MM005A.MANDT AND WB010A.MANDT = LCODE.MANDT AND WB010A.BSU_ARA > '' AND WB010A.LIFNR = MM012A.LIFNR AND WB010A.LIFNR = MM005A.LIFNR AND LCODE.LANG = #G_LANG# AND LCODE.CODE1 = 'VKGRP' AND LCODE.CODE2 = WB010A.VKGRP --AND MM005A.LGORT IN ('9221', '9249') ORDER BY MM005A.LGORT, MM012A.NAME1 WITH UR
